title: Encore: Grandfather Stone feat. Diane Rehm and Jonathan Joss
dc:creator: WBUR
description: In honor of Indigenous Peoples' Day, we're revisiting this Seneca tale from Season 2 about the origin of stories -- co-starring NPR veteran Diane Rehm and Jonathan Joss (Parks and Recreation, Comanche Moon).
itunes:author: WBUR
